===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=せいか}} compound {{m|ja|聖火|tr=syengH xwaX|lit=holy or sacred fire}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} traditional {{m|cmn|聖火}} and simplified {{m|cmn|圣火|tr=shènghuǒ||sacred fire; Olympic flame}}.

* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}

* {{IPA|lang=ja|[se̞ːka̠]}}

{{ja-noun|せいか|hhira=せいくわ}}
